_comments.title: The main heading for the hero section. Use {businessName} as a placeholder for the business name.
_comments.subtitle: The main subheading that appears below the title.
_comments.additionalText: An array of extra text lines to display. Each string is a new paragraph.
_comments.buttons: An array of buttons to display. 'text' is the button label. 'action' can be 'scrollTo' (to scroll to an element ID) or 'redirect' (to navigate to a URL). 'target' is the ID or URL.
_comments.animation: Controls the animation timing. 'duration' is in seconds. 'delayIncrement' is the delay between each animated element.
